# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = collect(eachline(text))
    for (i, line) in enumerate(lines)
        if length(line) > text_width
            insert!(lines, i, "")  # 在第 `i` 行插入一个空字符串，即换行符
            while length(line) + length(lines[i]) >= text_width
                splice!(lines, i, popat(line, 1))  # 从第 `i` 行的开头移除一个单词
            end
        end
    end
    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```

使用示例：

```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello World This is a very long sentence that should be wrapped at 10 characters per line.")
"Hello World\nThis is a very long\nsentence that should be\nwrapped at 10\ncharacters per line."
```
